title: IoT Systems Intern
description: Design and develop Internet of Things solutions using Arduino, Raspberry Pi, and various sensors. Work on data collection from connected devices and implement communication protocols. Assist in building dashboards for IoT data visualization and analytics.

title: Robotics Engineering Intern
description: Work on robotic system design and programming using ROS (Robot Operating System). Assist in developing autonomous navigation algorithms and sensor integration. Participate in testing and debugging robotic prototypes for industrial applications.

title: Mechanical Engineering Intern
description: Support product design and development using CAD software like SolidWorks and AutoCAD. Assist in manufacturing process optimization and quality control procedures. Learn about lean manufacturing and continuous improvement methodologies.

title: Electrical Engineering Intern
description: Work on electrical system design and power distribution projects. Assist in PCB design and embedded systems development. Support electrical testing and commissioning activities for industrial equipment.

title: Civil Engineering Intern
description: Support construction project management and structural design activities. Assist in site supervision and quality assurance for building projects. Learn about project scheduling and cost estimation techniques.

title: Chemical Engineering Intern
description: Work on chemical process design and optimization in manufacturing facilities. Assist in process safety analysis and environmental compliance monitoring. Support pilot plant operations and scale-up activities.

title: Aerospace Engineering Intern
description: Support aircraft design and testing activities including aerodynamic analysis and structural calculations. Assist in flight testing procedures and data analysis. Learn about aerospace materials and manufacturing processes.

title: Automotive Engineering Intern
description: Work on vehicle design and development including engine testing and performance optimization. Assist in electric vehicle technology development and autonomous driving systems. Support vehicle safety testing and compliance procedures.

title: Manufacturing Engineering Intern
description: Support production line optimization and industrial automation projects. Assist in implementing Industry 4.0 technologies and smart manufacturing systems. Learn about supply chain integration and operational excellence.
